hero-subtitle: Pioneering Eco-Conscious Solutions for a Sustainable Future
hero-desc: As Nepal's premier manufacturer of lead products and recycling solutions, we are dedicated to driving environmental sustainability through industrial innovation.
mission-desc: At Aarshi Industries, our mission is to seamlessly merge industrial advancement with environmental stewardship. We lead the charge in sustainable manufacturing, delivering superior quality products to a growing roster of clients across Asia.
journey-desc: Founded in 2010, Aarshi Industries has evolved from a visionary local startup into a regional powerhouse for lead products and recycling. Our growth is anchored in our unwavering commitment to sustainability, innovation, and quality excellence.
product-desc-1: Our base product, refined from recycled scrap to exceptional purity.
contact-desc: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out for inquiries or to book an appointment.
footer-desc: Pioneering sustainable solutions across Asia since 2010. Committed to environmental responsibility and industrial excellence.
